CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Reserve Bank relative to Borealis Investment Council?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Reserve Bank is {below} Borealis Investment Council in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total interest rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Borealis Investment Council}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total interest rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverhaven Reserve Bank}.

VE.Q: What is Borealis Investment Council's Interest Rate in 1965?
VE.A: Borealis Investment Council's interest rate in 1965 is {3.56} %.

VE.Q: What is Silverhaven Reserve Bank's Interest Rate in 1971?
VE.A: Silverhaven Reserve Bank's interest rate in 1971 is {2.83} %.

VE.Q: What is Silverhaven Reserve Bank's Interest Rate in 1970?
VE.A: Silverhaven Reserve Bank's interest rate in 1970 is {2.85} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Interest Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum interest rate is {2.68} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Interest Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum interest rate is {4.85} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Interest Rate level recorded for Borealis Investment Council?
EVJ.A: Borealis Investment Council reached approximately {4.85} % in {1972}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Interest Rate level recorded for Borealis Investment Council?
EVJ.A: Borealis Investment Council's lowest recorded level is approximately {3.47} % in {1964}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Interest Rate?
SC.A: The average total interest rate is {7.23} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Interest Rate exceed 7.40 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Interest Rate go below 7.05 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1971, was the average total Interest Rate higher or lower than between 1964 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total interest rate between 1966 and 1971 was {higher} than between 1964 and 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Interest Rate in 1964 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total interest rate in 1964 was {lower} than in 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1971, did the total Interest Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1965 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total interest rate between 1965 and 1971 was {larger} than between 1965 and 1966.

NC.Q: Was the total Interest Rate in 1965 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total interest rate in 1965 was {lower} than in 1972.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Borealis Investment Council} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Silverhaven Reserve Bank, Borealis Investment Council}.
